name: The Great Washing Machine King
overview: The Great Washing Machine King is a rather surreal game for the Commodore 64 in the same mold as games like Manic Miner or Jet Set Willy, except a bit weirder and with less platforming. The game was developed by the team at Digital Monastery (the game development division of cracking/demo group Hokuto Force), and was released into the public domain on December 12, 2020.
